31#ifndef _OPENSOLARIS_SYS_CRED_H_
32#define _OPENSOLARIS_SYS_CRED_H_
33
34#include <sys/param.h>
35#include <sys/types.h>
36
37#ifdef _KERNEL
38#include <sys/kauth.h>
39
40#define CRED() (kauth_cred_get())
41#define kcred cred0
42
43extern kauth_cred_t cred0;
44
45#define crgetuid(cr) kauth_cred_geteuid(cr)
46#define crgetruid(cr) kauth_cred_getuid(cr)
47#define crgetgid(cr) kauth_cred_getegid(cr)
48#define crgetrgid(cr) kauth_cred_getgid(cr)
49#define crgetngroups(cr) kauth_cred_ngroups(cr)
50#define cralloc() kauth_cred_alloc()
51#define crhold(cr) kauth_cred_hold(cr)
52#define crfree(cr) kauth_cred_free(cr)
53#define crsetugid(cr, u, g) ( \
54 kauth_cred_setuid(cr, u), \
55 kauth_cred_setgid(cr, g), \
56 kauth_cred_seteuid(cr, u), \
57 kauth_cred_setegid(cr, g), \
58 kauth_cred_setsvuid(cr, u), \
59 kauth_cred_setsvgid(cr, g), 0)
60#define crsetgroups(cr, gc, ga) \
61 kauth_cred_setgroups(cr, ga, gc, 0, UIO_SYSSPACE)
62#define crgetsid(cr, i) (NULL)
63
64static __inline gid_t *
65crgetgroups(cred_t *cr)
66{
67 static gid_t gids[NGROUPS_MAX];
68
69 memset(gids, 0, sizeof(gids));
70 if (kauth_cred_getgroups(cr, gids, NGROUPS_MAX, UIO_SYSSPACE) != 0)
71 return NULL;
72
73 return gids;
74}
75
76static __inline int
77groupmember(gid_t gid, cred_t *cr)
78{
79 int result;
80
81 kauth_cred_ismember_gid(cr, gid, &result);
82 return result;
83}
84
85#endif /* _KERNEL */
86
87#endif /* _OPENSOLARIS_SYS_CRED_H_ */
88
